definition: private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Most of all, remember that it's private.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，记住，情书是私信。

sentences.english: But avoid anything confidential unless it's a DM.
sentences.chinese: 但不要发一些机密的信息，除非你发的是私信。

definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
to share (let others have some of sth good)
